entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Leaf Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.9°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
